mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_dtl ( ORD_NO , PROD_ID , PROD_NM , OPT_COMB_NO , ORD_STUS , PROD_PRC , PROD_DC_PER , QTY , PROD_TOTAL_PAY_AMT , SEND_DDLN , REGR_ID) SELECT #{ordNo} , #{prodId} , #{prodNm} , #{optCombNo} , '10' # 결제완료 , P.SALE_PRC # 판매가 , P.DC_PER # 할인율 , #{qty} , #{prodTotalPayAmt} , DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) , #{regrId} FROM (SELECT PRC.SALE_PRC, PRC.DC_PER FROM PRODUCT PROD JOIN PRICE PRC ON PROD.PROD_ID = PRC.PROD_ID WHERE PROD.PROD_ID = #{prodId}) P
